text: Paul Cantero (born 5 March 1980), is a retired Micronesian footballer who played as a defender. ==International career== Cantero represented the Federated States of Micronesia at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
